overview: Vineet Dharmadhikari has 27 years of experience in the semiconductor industry. He joins Stion from KLA-Tencor, where he worked as Vice President / General Manager for the Metrology Division. Prior to joining KLA-Tencor, Vineet spent six years at Novellus Systems, where he held various senior management positions, including Vice President and General Manager of their PECVD business unit. He also spent more than eight years in various engineering and product development roles at Intevac Systems and Genus Inc. (now Aixtron AG), including Vice President of Engineering and Vice President of R&D.

relationships.title: Senior VP of Engineering and COO
